title: S8E02 – "What You Can't See Can Hurt You" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you seven spine-chilling tales from author James Colton, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about eerie lights, dark waters, abandoned vehicles, violent vegetation, unhappy anniversaries, sinister sanctuaries, and weird wallpaper.

                  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
